content: crochet cotswold baby hats - simple little hat with a pulledscrunchie look top can be made in different sizes just by changing your hook size the pattern instructions are in both usa and uk formats written in english please note that the pattern is available for free on my blog ** www crochetncreate com 1 ** using different hook sizes see materials sizes to fit approx newborn 0-3 3-6 6-12 level intermediate copyright ©2022 crochetncreate do not sell reproduce or copy this pattern in any way you are welcome to sell anything you make from this pattern 1 https //crochetncreate com/cotswold-crochet-baby-hat/
